backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no backend logic needed for mainnet deployment.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence listing hover-based desktop header dropdown updates and single-dropdown behavior with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Compiled summaries of all major frontend files covering navigation, routing, layout, content rendering, styling, and hooks.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Mainnet deployment checklist outlining frontend asset canister build and verification steps.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS layers defining light/dark theme variables and base styling tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading fonts, metadata, favicon, and mounting the React app.
frontend/RELEASE_NOTES.md: Release notes for initial mainnet deployment detailing features, routing, assets, content, configuration, and testing guidance.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component applying ThemeProvider and rendering the TanStack Router.
frontend/src/components/brand/BrandButto: Wrapper around shadcn Button adding brand-specific primary, secondary, and accent variants.
Brand logo component with image fallback to text when loading fails.
frontend/src/components/content/ContentR: Renders structured content blocks including headings, paragraphs, lists, emphasis, and link-list grids.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Renders the site footer with brand info and navigation sections sourced from navigationConfig.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Implements the main header with navigation, dropdowns, mobile menu, and solutions mega menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Defines the overall page layout including header, footer, and routing outlet wrapped in the scroll sync provider.
frontend/src/components/layout/Solutions: Displays a two‑column mega menu for solution categories with hover‑based service previews.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Provides the homepage hero section with background image, headline, and calls to action.
Lists Google Drive source document URLs for manual content reference per page and service.
frontend/src/content/contentTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for structured page content blocks, sections, and pages.
frontend/src/content/pages.ts: Contains static page content definitions for solutions pages, including sections and service links.
frontend/src/content/solutionServicePage: Defines PageContent objects for individual solution service pages, including sections and text for each service.
frontend/src/content/solutionServices.ts: Lists all service definitions with page IDs, titles, routes, and parent solution categories.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on Internet Identity state and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDropdownHoverRegio: Tracks pointer position to determine whether a dropdown’s trigger or panel should remain open and signals when it should close.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context, loading, login, logout, and identity state management using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageTitle.ts: Sets the document title based on the page title and brand name, restoring the previous title on unmount.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module for future backend query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSolutionsActiveCat: Observes category sections to determine which is most visible and triggers updates with hysteresis to avoid flicker.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark theme CSS variables plus base and utility styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider and mounts the root component.
frontend/src/pages/ContentPage.tsx: Renders dynamic content pages with optional themed styling and banner handling with image fallback logic.
frontend/src/pages/CustomDomainPage.tsx: Displays instructions for configuring a custom domain, including DNS steps and a copyable hostname.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Homepage showing hero section and grids of AV solutions and industries served.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Simple 404 page with illustration, message, and button linking back home.
Landing page listing solution categories with banner, scroll-synced sections, and links to service pages.
frontend/src/router/router.tsx: Defines the application's route structure using TanStack Router, including static solution and industry routes plus dynamic service routes.
frontend/src/site/brand.ts: Exports brand metadata such as name, domain, logo, and contact details.
frontend/src/site/industryThemes.ts: Defines per-industry color themes and provides a helper to fetch a theme by page ID.
frontend/src/site/navigation.ts: Defines the site's navigation tree and provides a utility to flatten it into a list of routes.
frontend/src/site/pageBannerResolver.ts: Resolves banner images using filename conventions with fallback to a predefined banner map.
frontend/src/site/pageBanners.ts: Maps page IDs to specific banner image paths and alt text for hero sections.
frontend/src/site/pageThemes.ts: Returns page theme settings by identifying whether a page belongs to solutions or industries.
frontend/src/solutions/solutionsScrollSy: Provides React context for tracking the active solutions category and resets it when navigating away.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state including features, requests, metadata, and versioning.
